final_answer: The humor in the image comes from the ironic situation where the woman has an empty basket available but chooses to carry all the items in her arms instead. This creates a humorous contrast because the logical choice would be to use the basket, which remains unused. The struggle of managing many items without the aid of the basket amplifies the absurdity of the situation, making it funny. This kind of satirical take is often relatable, as it points out the illogical decisions people sometimes make in everyday life.
ground_truth: The image is ironic, because even when there are steel frame baskets are available at the supermarkets people prefer carrying the items in hand
